analysis.description:
ICOBuyer.buyICO (/unique_chucks/14/0x22ebab2fba4a1648aa8a0bdaea975738a7810e24.sol#154-169) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- this.balance == 0

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x22ebab2fba4a1648aa8a0bdaea975738a7810e24.sol:
